info.task: navigate forwards into a complementary landmark
info.title: Navigate forwards into a complementary landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeComplementary
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the complementary landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the complementary landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('beforelink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Top' link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Top' link.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, exit Forms Mode to activate the Virtual Cursor by pressing Escape.
